messages.message:
I'm facing a strange issue with validation in `Prod 24.42.3`. In lieu of typing out the issue, I've recorded the issue and you can view the recording via the link below:

https://instabase.zoom.us/clips/share/d2xqwhEIY1NfajG08psYC2LJHP0ia4P0USEHIx-LIN1LbsyvWhD4s9kzbN1_oLwA4wPp5Cefsg5zmdWdHRgxA6j9.Mhod8MmbUvVh2Fbp
Passcode: FA9ZMf.#

TL;DR/W:
I am getting some issues setting OCR validation rules at the class/field level. Changing OCR validation rules at the class/field level sets OCR validation rules at the project/field level (which doesn't make sense.) I haven't tested other validations.
